about-this-site.body: This site is made from a static site generator I wrote in Go. I write my page content in Markdown files and the files get converted to html! Over the past few years I've built multiple portfolio websites, mostly in React and with a framework like Next.js. I decided to go frameworkless for my personal site and build out the features I needed myself. So, this site is a work in progress and always will be. I'm having fun with it.

frontMatter.description: A little note about this website
frontMatter.title: About This Site

intro.body:
Hi, my name is Thomas and I like making things. I'll share those things here.

Sound good? Okay.

Best,

Thomas
